TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SearchContinuationToken extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Encapsulates state required to continue fetching search results. This is necessary when Azure Cognitive Search cannot fulfill a search request with a single response.
Docs.remarks: This class supports using JsonConvert to convert to and from a JSON payload. This can be useful if you call Azure Cognitive Search from a web application and you need to exchange continuation tokens with a browser or mobile client while paging through search results.
